course_description:
This course is designed to provide students with an understanding of rhythm using a series of
Balance, Auditory and Vision exercises using bags and balls. Exercises address visual tracking deficiencies, auditory imprecision, impulsivity, rhythmic balance, and anxiety issues. We will be focusing on all this using Bal-A-Vis-X exercises.
sections: Class Nbr: 4199, Section #: 1, Type: PE, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: G. Moss-Brown, Status: Wait List
